name: Battle of Demons
description:
A light weight strategy game with fully simulated battles.

Try to build and train you'r army so you'll become the new Emperor of the Kingdom

You are not the only one trying to take over the Kingdom

Will you be stronger? Will you controll important places?

Strategy

Because the battle are fully simulated, the focus of strategy is in controling the right places and improving the right thing.

Battles Start of Battle

Every single soldier get their strength and health, relative to you'r stats.

During Battle

Every soldier get an invidual target which they will hunt until either they're dead or if escape became the only solution

PS: You can speed up the game speed with the up and down arrow.
